name: Dinner Tonight: Cranberry Chipotle Sauce
description: Every time I trek back to the parents house to arrange plans for the fiancée to become the wife, I sneak a peak at my mom’s enormous cookbook collection. She has a wide arrange of professional classics, and her fair...
recipeIngredient: 2 cups whole cranberries, fresh or frozen

recipeInstructions.text: 1. Toss everything in a pot and bring to a simmer, uncovered. Cook for 20 minutes.
2. Pour into a blender and puree.
